parse: Preposition
str2: A primary preposition; 'fore', i.e. In front of, prior to.

parse: Noun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Theudas, a Jewish pretender of date about 4 B.C., otherwise unknown. Of uncertain origin; Theudas, an Israelite.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To raise up, set up; I rise from among (the) dead; I arise, appear. From ana and histemi; to stand up.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Active
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Adverb
str2: Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Adjective - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: Four hundred. Plural from tessares and hekaton; four hundred.

parse: Noun - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Partiality, an inclination towards. From a compound of pros and klino; a leaning towards, i.e. proclivity.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From ana and haireomai; to take up, i.e. Adopt; by implication, to take away, i.e. Abolish, murder.

parse: Adjective - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: How much, how great, how many, as great as, as much. By reduplication from hos; as As.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To break up, disperse, dissolve. From dia and luo; to dissolve utterly.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.

parse: Preposition
str2: A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Adjective - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: No one, none, nothing.
